resources.string: Is the card red or black?
Is the card of higher or lower value?
The cards are equal! You loose.
You loose, the deck has no more cards. Press OK to start over.

The game is based on a social drinking game called Busdriver. The dealer puts out 5 cards with the front of the card facing down. You start out by guessing if the last dealt card is of color red or black. Going forward, you continue to guess if the next card is of higher or lower value (compared to the last one). Aces are low. 

To win, you have to first guess the color correctly and then all the correct values of the next cards. If you choose to play this in the way of the drinking game, you get a penalty if you guess incorrectly. Penalty means taking a sip of the drink of your choice, the number of sips amounts to how many cards there are currently with the front facing to you. 

You can play until the deck is out of cards(52). Other then that, this is just a guessing game if you choose to play it like it is!
